metadata.name: Be My Valentine
metadata.description:
Today is Valentine's Day and my little boy is my biggest valentine!
I’ve been working on this piece for a while and I kept in my photo collection on my phone. One day, my 2 year old son, Samir, came across this video and he just loves it.. He keeps replaying it on my phone and saying “fly” cause he can’t say butterfly and he just keeps smiling at it. It’s so lovely and such a proud moment to see him enjoy what I created.
I dedicate this piece to the love of my life! My darling Samir!
